description:
One jacket for the mild rainy days of spring, the cold clear days of fall, and the downright nasty days of winter. When the warmth of summer starts to fade and you start thinking about jackets, the Pine Bank has the versatility to keep you comfortable until you start to feel summer in the air. Fully constructed from recycled materials, this 3-in-1 jacket has the kind of weather protection you can feel good about. With a waterproof breathable outer layer that zips together with a light quilted layer, you get options and more space in your closet.

  • Both layers are made from recycled polyester
  • Outer shell uses H2No® waterproof breathable material and has all seams taped, so you stay dry in even the worst weather
  • Insulated layer is light and wind resistant, with a PFC-free DWR finish that shakes off light rain and snow
  • 100-g Thermogreen® synthetic insulation is light, warm and 100% recycled
  • Smooth recycled polyester lining glides easily over other layers
  • Adjustable hood helps keep rain off of your face
  • Pockets on both the inner and outer layer, so there is always somewhere to warm your hands
  • Scalloped hem gives you room to move
  • Regular fit feels just like it should
name: Patagonia Pine Bank 3-in-1 Parka - Women's
